title: Mobile Suit Gundam - Hybrid 4-Koma Dai Sensen
original_name: 機動戦士ガンダム ハイブリッド 4 コマ大戦線
sinopse: A series of 4-koma based on the various Gundam stories in the UC timeline, including works such as Mobile Suit Gundam, Z Gundam, ZZ Gundam, Char's Counterattack, 0080 War in the Pocket, 08th MS Team, Unicorn Gundam, MS Igloo, 0083 Stardust Memories, etc.
